text: Eto - te, kotoryye otklonyayut lyudey ot religii Allakha - islama, - zapreshchaya im prinyat' yego, a on - pravil'nyy put' Allakha. Oni stremyatsya k tomu, chtoby lyudi poshli po nepravil'nomu puti soglasno ikh strastyam i prikhotyam. Oni ne veruyut ni v budushchuyu zhizn', ni v to, chto neveruyushchiye budut nakazany, a veruyushchiye budut voznagrazhdeny
